Tajine Mtewem, nke a na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ Mtewem (Arabic) bụ nri ọdịnaala nke ndi Obodo Algeria, ya na kpọmkwem Algerine (site n'obodo Algiers), a na-eji anụ ọkụkọ maọbụ anụ nwa atụrụ, galik, chickpeas ya na almonds eme nri ahụ. A na-eji yabasị na galik buru ibu, dịka aha ya na-egosi na okwu mtewem pụtara "na galik", a na-esikarị ya n'ime ite Tajine
Dịka ọtụtụ nri nke ndi Obodo Algeria, enwere ike iji ya na ofe ọcha, maọbụ ofe na-acha ọbara ọbara.
